summary: Bitcoin futures open interest on CME has declined by more than $1 billion since its peak on January 10, according to an analyst.
title: Deribit sees increase in bitcoin futures open interest despite declines on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange
content: Bitcoin BTC +1.25% futures open interest on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange has declined by more than $1 billion since its peak on Jan. 10, whilst derivatives open interest on Deribit has increased, according to Deribit Chief Commercial Officer Luuk Strijers.
The Deribit Chief Commercial Officer said the declining trend in open interest on CME could imply several underlying market movements.
